heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_doom_bringer
heroes.bio_loc:
He that burns and is not consumed, devours and is never sated, kills and is beyond all judgment--Lucifer brings doom to all who would stand against him. Bearing away souls on the tip of a fiery sword, he is the Fallen One, a once-favored general from the realm behind the light, cast out for the sin of defiance: he would not kneel.

Six times his name was tolled from the great bell of Vashundol. Six and sixty times his wings were branded, until only smoking stumps remained. Without wings, he slipped loose from the tethers that bound him within the light and he fell screaming to earth. A crater in the desert, Paradise lost. Now he attacks without mercy, without motive, the only living being able to move freely between the seven dark dominions. Lashed by inescapable needs, twisted by unimaginable talents, Doom carries his own hell with him wherever he goes. Defiant to the last. Eventually, the world will belong to Doom.
heroes.hype_loc: One way or another, Doom shuts down his enemies. Devouring creeps to claim the various skills they had in life, he can place a lingering silence upon a foe's spells and items with his ultimate as he torches his foes.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Can prevent a single enemy from using abilties and items

abilities.name: doom_bringer_devour
abilities.desc_loc: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed and gaining armor temporarily while it digests the creep. If autocast is deactivated, Doom will not acquire the creep's abilities. Duration is equal to the cooldown.
abilities.lore_loc: Lucifer's appetite and greed are never sated.
notes_loc: Gives Doom the original bounty of the creep, along with the bonus gold.
If you devour a creep without abilities, you'll keep the abilities you had previously.
abilities.shard_loc: Allows Devour to be cast on enemy heroes, reducing their maximum health by 15%  for the duration of the devour and provides Doom with a passive basic ability they have.

abilities.name: doom_bringer_scorched_earth
abilities.desc_loc: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies, while also granting him increased movement speed.
abilities.lore_loc: The Fallen One spreads destruction in his wake, sparing none from the flame which sustains him.
notes_loc: Scorched Earth follows Doom, centered on his location.

abilities.name: doom_bringer_infernal_blade
abilities.desc_loc: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for %ministun_duration% seconds and applies a %burn_duration% second burn that deals a base damage plus a percentage of the target's Max HP as damage per second.
abilities.lore_loc: Lucifer shares the fire branding bestowed upon him at the time of his exile.
abilities.shard_loc: Infernal Blade stun duration is increased. If the enemy's level is a multiple of 3, or above level 24, they will be stunned for a longer duration and take bonus damage.

abilities.name: doom_bringer_doom
abilities.desc_loc:
Inflicts a curse that dispels an enemy Hero and prevents an them from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.lore_loc: When a name is tolled from the bell of Vashundol, doom is sure to follow.
notes_loc: Units afflicted by Doom can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.
abilities.scepter_loc: Increases Doom duration and applies Break.
